snippet: After 90 minutes, voters are left with as many questions for Mitt Romney and President Obama as they had before it started.
abstract: Editorial contends first debate between Pres Obama and Mitt Romney provided little guidance for voters trying to understand the choice in the election; expresses hope that Obama is more aggressive in future debates.
lead_paragraph: After 90 minutes, voters are left with as many questions for Mitt Romney and President Obama as they had before it started.
